title: Arduino
content: Learn to program and build projects using Arduino microcontrollers, sensors, and actuators for hands-on electronics and coding experience.

title: Raspberry Pi
content: Master using Raspberry Pi for various applications, from home automation to programming and electronics, with hands-on projects.

title: Drone Building
content: Design, assemble, and program your own drone, understanding the mechanics, electronics, and software

title: Voice Assistant
content: Create a voice-activated assistant using software and hardware, learning natural language processing and voice recognition technologies.

title: Mobile Controller Device
content: Develop and program mobile controllers for various applications, integrating with hardware and software for seamless user interaction.

title: 3D Modeling
content: Learn 3D modeling techniques using software to create digital representations of objects for various applications, including 3D printing.

title: 3D Printing
content: Understand the principles of 3D printing, from design to execution, and produce physical models using different printing technologies.
